Class SudokuCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • SudokuCell

  • public class SudokuCell
extends Shape
    Sudoku Cell Shape which is drawn onto the board. Every cell contains a number in it (clear cell in a Sudoku is represented by 0).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Shape

        height, leftCorner, thickness, width

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
        java.awt.Color defaultColor,
        java.awt.Color defaultBGColor)
        Draws the cell and the number inside it. Sets the colors appropriately. Also adds thick grid lines to the board based on what cell we are drawing.
        Parameters:
        g -
        defaultColor -
        defaultBGColor -
